body_html:
On more thing about the flow sample :
Just stumbled upon the issue #2260
You can also take a look at the first try on implementation (basically reimplementing MXNet module's C and cuda code) https://github.com/1zb/deformable-convolution-pytorch/blob/master/src/deform_conv_cuda_kernel.cu
Deformable convolution are obviously more complex than a simple flow sampling, but it does use offsets and unnormalized coordinates. And flow sample is simply a 1x1 deformable convolution with associated offsets 😄
I feel like maybe there could be a general purpose kernel for bilinear interpolation that could be used for all these kinds of modules.
What's your opinion ?
